title: Rohan Kotkar
author: Rohan Kotkar
content: Loan amount : 2.5 LTCDuration : 15 days Repayment on/before : 05-05-2023Repayment amount : 2.625 LTCLoan reason : Delayed salarySource of repayment : Salary + Freelancing[working on 2 projects atm]LTC address : MEvNhSMPtx89iP8fDkYXinC7LoMgzaBgseNote : This is not the first time I'm asking for a loan here.My previous loan request was back in 2020. Thread can be found here

comments.author: CryptoHFs
comments.body: what field do you work in?

comments.author: Rohan Kotkar
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoHFs on April 20, 2023, 05:45:55 PMwhat field do you work in?Assume the role of a Business Development Associate at an Edtech startup.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: What a pitty you didn't actually read the second post in that thread you quoted:Quote from: condoras on March 30, 2020, 01:09:41 PMQuote from: Rohan Kotkar on March 30, 2020, 12:57:47 PMHello viewers.I'm in need of $40 for the period of 7 days(hopefully I'll repay within the time period). Let me know if anyone is interested in filling this request. I'll lock this thread within 7 hours if there is no response as I'll try some other means to fulfill the need.Loan amount: $40Duration: 7 daysRepayment amount: 10% (+-)Collateral: NoneThanks.Do you know that you need valid collateral for a loan, right?Lenders are increasingly requiring collateral regardless of the amount being lent.Â  Perhaps you should try that lender given you had a semi successful loan.

comments.author: Rohan Kotkar
comments.body: Quote from: Timelord2067 on April 21, 2023, 12:03:04 AMWhat a pitty you didn't actually read the second post in that thread you quoted:Quote from: condoras on March 30, 2020, 01:09:41 PMQuote from: Rohan Kotkar on March 30, 2020, 12:57:47 PMHello viewers.I'm in need of $40 for the period of 7 days(hopefully I'll repay within the time period). Let me know if anyone is interested in filling this request. I'll lock this thread within 7 hours if there is no response as I'll try some other means to fulfill the need.Loan amount: $40Duration: 7 daysRepayment amount: 10% (+-)Collateral: NoneThanks.Do you know that you need valid collateral for a loan, right?Lenders are increasingly requiring collateral regardless of the amount being lent. Â Perhaps you should try that lender given you had a semi successful loan.You should also check out the request filled by irfan_pak which was also repaid and surprisingly merited by condoros who indeed asked for collateral at the start.Here's the repaid quote

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: @Rohan Kotkar if you have a valid collateral (other crypto / btc) I can provide this loan. otherwise no... ok you have repaid a loan in the past, and the amount you're asking isn't too much... but this is not enough (for me) to send a loan to an unknown user with rank as "member"

comments.author: Rohan Kotkar
comments.body: Quote from: bitbollo on April 24, 2023, 08:16:19 AM@Rohan Kotkar if you have a valid collateral (other crypto / btc) I can provide this loan. otherwise no... ok you have repaid a loan in the past, and the amount you're asking isn't too much... but this is not enough (for me) to send a loan to an unknown user with rank as "member"  I apologize, but I do not possess an acceptable form of collateral such as BTC or other cryptocurrencies. If I did, I would have utilized them for a swap rather than seeking a loan. Thank you for your understanding, but it appears I may not meet your collateral criteria. I will patiently await alternative lenders who may be able to fulfill my request.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Rohan Kotkar on April 24, 2023, 12:32:37 PMIf I did, I would have utilized them for a swap rather than seeking a loan. If you still you may take a loan. As if you want to take a loan to buy a car you will not sell your land though you can do that. You won't do that as the price of that may increase or you may not rearrange that types of property.
